name: Tigebra
description: The Tigebra is a large and formidable monstrosity characterized by its chaotic evil nature, having a strong build with notable natural armor and a vicious appearance.
memorable: Its ability to remain a threat even after being defeated, thanks to its 'Final Fury' ability, makes it particularly dangerous.
goals: To hunt down and eliminate intruders.
relations: May be encountered alongside other chaotic evil creatures.
environment: Typically found in dark, isolated regions, especially where it can ambush prey.
strengths: Resilient in battle due to high hit points and natural armor, alongside advantages on saving throws against magic.
weaknesses: Very low intelligence and charisma, limiting strategic planning and social interaction.
attacks: Can deliver a powerful multiattack with a bite that inflicts piercing and poison damage, along with slashing damage from claws.
most_powerful_ability: The 'Hypnotic Gaze' ability allows it to paralyze enemies, significantly shifting dynamics in combat.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 10 feet, with a passive perception score of 17, making it effective at detecting hidden threats.
skills: Skilled with a +2 perception modifier, enhancing its sensory detection capabilities.
additional_information: Damage immunity to poison and several condition immunities.
Can attack even after being reduced to zero hit points through 'Final Fury'.
Retains its formidable combat statistics as a remnant.
Advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks due to 'Keen Hearing and Smell'.
The poison inflicted is particularly potent against resistant or immune creatures.
test_queries: large chaotic evil monster with poison
monster that paralyzes enemies with gaze
Tigebra ability to attack after death
